config.name: Death Knight
config.description: Skeleton Warriors ascend into Death Knights, clad in dark power and armed with devastating combat skills. Beware: they have grown too powerful to follow their master.

config.name: Lich
config.description: Skeletal Mages transform into Liches, ancient sorcerers wielding destructive bone magic and curses. Beware: they have grown too powerful to follow their master.

config.name: Ancient Golem
config.description: Summoned Golems awaken as Ancient Golems, eternal constructs infused with divine and elemental auras.
